title: Star Telegram: «Hail and heavy rain possible in Dallas-Fort Worth this weekend. Here’s when storms arrive» - Related news - Newstral.com
text: Newstral Article [Star Telegram](/en/sources/29369) on 2024-11-01 18:28 Hail and heavy rain possible in Dallas-Fort Worth this weekend. Here’s when storms arrive Related news [Hail, gusty winds possible as new storms arrive in Dallas-Fort Worth.
